definition: to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: The old lags used to joke on the convict boats.
sentences.chinese: 多次坐牢的慣犯過去常在囚船上開玩笑。

sentences.english: The public was outraged when the vardened criminal was released from prison.
sentences.chinese: 那個屢教不改的慣犯從監獄裏釋放時，公衆感到憤慨。

sentences.english: First time offenders can expect leniency whereas repeat offenders can expect severe punishment.
sentences.chinese: 初犯會從寬處理，而慣犯會受到嚴厲的懲罰。

sentences.english: That habitual criminal has been locked away.
sentences.chinese: 那個慣犯已經被關起來。
